mapper.insert: INSERT INTO blog_cate(cate_no, blog_categrpno, cate_name, cate_seqno, cate_visible, cate_rdate, cate_cnt) VALUES(blog_cate_seq.nextval, #{blog_categrpno}, #{cate_name}, #{cate_seqno}, #{cate_visible}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT cate_no, blog_categrpno, cate_name, cate_seqno, cate_visible, cate_rdate, cate_cnt FROM blog_cate ORDER BY blog_categrpno ASC, cate_seqno ASC
